# Data Ingestion — Wizard UX polish & docs

## Summary

- Finalize Streamlit wizard polish (progress indicator, inline help, translation hooks, artifacts links).
- Ensure error/success messages are user-friendly and include remediation pointers.
- Update `docs/features/data_ingestion.md` and CHANGELOG/release notes for GA toggle.

## Acceptance

- [ ] Wizard flow (upload → map → validate → dry-run → publish) includes progress + contextual guidance
- [ ] Success screen links to artifacts and alias summary; errors point to fixes
- [ ] Feature docs updated with screenshots/steps; CHANGELOG entry drafted
